pylapp.smoothclicker.android.json

Class JsonConfigExporter

  • java.lang.Object
    • pylapp.smoothclicker.android.json.JsonConfigExporter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ConfigExporter

    public class JsonConfigExporter
extends java.lang.Object
implements ConfigExporter
    Class which consists on exporting the configuration of the app in a JSON file

    26/05/2016
    Version:
    1.6.0
    Author:
    pylapp
